name: WebDragSourceAction
desc: Actions that the source object of a drag operation can perform.

items.name: static var DHTML: WebDragSourceAction
items.desc: Allows DHTML (such as JavaScript) in the source object to initiate a drag operation.

items.name: static var image: WebDragSourceAction
items.desc: Allows the user to drag an image in the source object.

items.name: static var link: WebDragSourceAction
items.desc: Allows the user to drag a link in the source object.

items.name: static var selection: WebDragSourceAction
items.desc: Allows the user to drag a selection in the source object.

items.name: static var any: WebDragSourceAction
items.desc: Allows any defined action to occur.
